statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE password_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username IN ('user1', 'user2', 'user3');
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, created_at FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '8272a60d-aa90-4a79-96bd-29d4636e10ad';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'joh%';
SELECT username, email, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, t.amount FROM users u JOIN user_transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, address FROM user_profile WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, p.full_name, a.activity_type FROM users u JOIN user_profile p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN user_activity a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, p.address FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_profile p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(a.activity_id) AS total_activities FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_activity a ON u.user_id = a.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_activities > 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, full_name, phone_number FROM user_profile ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, course_name, enrollment_date FROM user_courses WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email, password FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM user_profile WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM user_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT course_name, user_id, enrollment_date FROM user_courses WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, full_name, address FROM user_profiles ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, amount FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM user_logs WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM user_profiles ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT u.username, t.amount, t.transaction_type FROM users u JOIN user_transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
SELECT l.log_id, l.log_timestamp, u.username, l.log_message FROM user_logs l JOIN users u ON l.user_id = u.user_id WHERE l.log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
